subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
Scholarships and Fellowships
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: In response to the scandal involving players trading memorabilia for tattoos, Ohio State’s football program was given a one-year bowl ban and docked nine scholarships.
snippet: In response to the scandal involving players trading memorabilia for tattoos, Ohio State’s football program was given a one-year bowl ban and docked nine scholarships.
